plot: Based on folklore, this Holocaust-period film tells the legend of a young Rabbi who uses ancient mysticism to rise up against the Nazis and protect a group of Czechoslovakian Jews.
title: Banks of the Vltava
plot_es: Based on folklore, this Holocaust-period film tells the legend of a young Rabbi who uses ancient mysticism to rise up against the Nazis and protect a group of Czechoslovakian Jews.
plot_en: Based on folklore, this Holocaust-period film tells the legend of a young Rabbi who uses ancient mysticism to rise up against the Nazis and protect a group of Czechoslovakian Jews.
